column5: So for the last couple of weeks I have been working on redoing the inside of my boat.  I stripped everything out of it as you can see from the before pictures.  Click on the pictures to see a larger picture.    So I added tackle storage (holds 18 stow away boxes), rod box (holds 12 rods), livewell (30x12x12 custom welded aluminum), casting deck and a 24V trolling motor.  Here are the after pictures    Was a great project, learned a lot!

Wow, you did a great job man. I'm guessing you put in a water pump/aerator in that livewell of yours, love the big bulky storage compartment for the tackle, very smart idea. I give it a 10/10!  Well done.
Thanks!  Yes it has a 500 GPH pump feeding the livewell
nice work.  The bow deck looks prime.
What a neat thing you have done. It really personalizes the boat and I am sure is a great source of accomplishment and pride. Nice. Jim
Excellent job looks like you put alot of time and effort into that can't wait to see the fish pics in it.
